description: Luke Molyneux nets his eighth league goal of the season as Doncaster Rovers continue their League Two promotion charge with victory over Gillingham.
title: Gillingham 0-1 Doncaster Rovers
title_page: League Two: Gillingham 0-1 Doncaster Rovers - BBC Sport
maintext:
Gillingham have failed to win any of their last three league games against Doncaster Rovers (D1 L2), though their last victory against the Yorkshire club did come on home soil in April 2023 (1-0).
Across their Football League history, Doncaster Rovers have won just three of their 36 away league games against Gillingham (D10 L23), keeping just four clean sheets during that time, and scoring an average of just 0.8 goals per match.
After going unbeaten across 15 consecutive home league games between December 2023 and September 2024 (W7 D8), Gillingham have since won just two of their last eight fixtures at Priestfield Stadium (D1 L5).
